alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 5:52PM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY FOR THE BASE OF THE NORTHERN BLUE MOUNTAINS OF OREGON... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter of a mile or less at times. For the Wind Advisory, for the base of the northern Blue Mountains of Oregon, southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 PM PST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dense fog will mostly be from Pendleton northeast along Oregon state highway 11 to the Washington border.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
